'''''Vinyar Tengwar 7''''' is the seventh issue of ''[[Vinyar Tengwar]]'', a journal dedicated to the scholarly study of the invented languages of  [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].
{{VTnav|6|8}}

==Contents==
* Cover: "Maglor before Himring" — Tom Loback
* E.L.F. News
* Letters to ''VT''

* "Transitions in Translations: 'Edition Shifting' in the Spanish ''LotR''" (column) — Arden R. Smith
* "''Essitalmar'': 'What's In a Name?'" (column) — Tom Loback
